text: Sarah Ferguson, Duchess of York, is the ex wife of Prince Andrew, 58. Although technically no longer a member of the royal family, Sarah – who is also known as Fergie – is still aunt to Prince William and Prince Harry. It is also known Sarah still lives with Prince Andrew at the Royal Lodge in Windsor. Surprisingly, Sarah was not among the 1, 900 guests at the wedding of Prince William to Kate Middleton, 36, in 2011. Yet she made the cut for Prince Harry ’ s wedding to Meghan Markle, 36, earlier this year, which was attended by a far fewer 600 guests. Sarah Ferguson was invited to Prince Harry's wedding this year but not Prince William's 2011 wedding Why was Sarah at Prince Harry ’ s nuptials but not Prince William ’ s? It
